amendment.description: Amendment prohibits any funds to be used to release water from the San Juan Chama Project or Middle Rio Grande Project for the purpose of complying with the Endangered Species Act.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to restrict the use of funds from being used to release water from the San Juan Chama Project or Middle Rio Grande Project for the purpose of complying with the Endangered Species Act of 1973.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Wilson (NM) amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A005) offered by Mrs. Wilson (NM).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Wilson (NM) amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
